channel.title: Revival-Rs | A 2006 Remake |
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Revival Rs[/B] [img]http://puu.sh/4EXe1.gif[/img]
[url=http:///][b]Forums[/b][/url]
Hello members of the Rune-Server Community I present to you Revival-Rs I know what you all may be thinking "Look another remake!" but the reason for why we are doing this is that for me and a couple of friends Runescape back in 2006 was the most amazing and fun filled time we'd ever had. I don't expect this to get around 500-1000 players to be honest im doing this to try and relive the past memories that I had.
[b]We will be using the released version of 2006Memorys but fixing many known bugs/glitches/dupes and adding much more complete content. The reason for why we are using such a complete base is because I do not want to spend alot of time on this project and mainly get on to playing it along with many other eager players.[/b]
Developers
[B]x32/Ahridok [/B]- Ranno [B]Roone [/B]- Jamal
[B]Update Log[/B]
[CODE][09-27-2013] - 2006memorys Downloaded [09-27-2013] - Repackaged the whole base and cleaned up ALOT of dead code [09-28-2013] - Patched up a small dupe[/CODE]
[IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/3611718/Media.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center][B]Media[/B]
[QUOTE]The networking has been edited and i tested it out by running 2000 bots they were spamming all in one spot and the server was not lagging alot but it was lagging may be because of my computer so to keep it from disconnecting actual players a cap of 1000 has been set as the players will be doing much more then just spamming.[/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4EgO8.png[/img]
[QUOTE]The sage of lumbridge has been with us for such a long time no remake is complete without him![/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4Ehrx.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Although this image isn't of RR it still shows the pvp aspect of the 2006 era of runescape it was a ton of fun pking alongside your friends and your clan.[/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4Eix7.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Remember the good old trading days before the grand exchange and when players were actually communicating with one another well we're trying to revive those memories.[/QUOTE]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uiTWA.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Runecrafting plays a very important role as it is the number one source of getting magic runes and fast! [/QUOTE] [img]http://i1282.photobucket.com/albums/a526/dylan1496/Untitled.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Random events are a good way to get some items and gain some expierience and they also help stop bots from gold farming[/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4Ejx6.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Are you brave enough to challenge the warriors of Al-Kharid if so take a trip down to the village of the desert![/QUOTE]
[img]http://puu.sh/4EjER.png[/img]
[QUOTE]Oo look at all the pretty colors! Yes firelighters are back with all of the colors![/QUOTE] [img]http://puu.sh/4EkcC.png[/img] [/center]
Media will be reserved for the later posts

item.title: Revival-Rs | A 2006 Remake |
item.dc:creator: @rooneyscape rooneyscape
item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

Clawz fury:

this will be good

I shall take that as a compliment thank you sir!

Updates Oct 5th, 2013

- In Bob's Brilliant Axes all axe prices are fixed. - Gliders do not work currently. It says "You can't fly from here." [X] (Need to complete the quest) - Music now turns off - Missing Jail Guard Npcs at Draynor Village. Near the Prison Cells. - Dark Wizards at Draynor Village are level 20. They are supposed to be level 7. [X] - Dark Wizards at Draynor Village are not aggressive. [X] - Only 1 Market Guard at Draynor Village near the stalls. [X] - Random thief in Lumbridge castle, middle floor. [X] - Timers are all messed up such as mining, woodcutting. [X] - Cup of Tea can not be drank. [X] - You can't have 3 letter names and under. [X] - Drinking beer doesn't work [X] - Trapdoor in Lumbridge Kitchen doesn't work [X] - Herblore is disabled (I'm sure you already knew that) [X] - Make the start music fade away [X] - I don't think food burns when cooking (If you're going for perfection) [X] - Cellar of the Lumbridge's castle (trapdoor/ladder, global object -spawns, RFD-chest [Bank, shops..]) [X] - Crystal chest (if not already implemented - Joining key halves together, unlocking the chest..) [X] - Music & sounds system implemented - Highwaymen will now drop Black capes 100% of the time - You can now pick bananas from Karamja - You can now sell items to the Falador general store

Read full topic

the 2006 remake thing… my thread, I have to admit that 95% was done by someone else, I just added what I mentioned in the previous post

Read full topic

item.title: Revival-Rs | A 2006 Remake |
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Docent:

Yep. Honestly, all I did was take the 2006Scape source (had all skills in it and working dialogue) and literally played the game, found bugs and imperfections (ex: clicking on ‘sacks’ wouldn’t do anything) and I basically fixed the bugs or added functions. I also added BY MYSELF 7 quests and a 100% functional canoe system.

What are you talking about?

Read full topic

item.title: Revival-Rs | A 2006 Remake |
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

We’re MoparScape, not Rune-Server.
Good luck with the development.

Read full topic

item.title: Revival-Rs | A 2006 Remake |
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Yep. Honestly, all I did was take the 2006Scape source (had all skills in it and working dialogue) and literally played the game, found bugs and imperfections (ex: clicking on ‘sacks’ wouldn’t do anything) and I basically fixed the bugs or added functions. I also added BY MYSELF 7 quests and a 100% functional canoe system.

item.description:
@rooneyscape wrote:

[CENTER]Revival Rs

Forums

Hello members of the Rune-Server Community I present to you Revival-Rs I know what you all may be thinking “Look another remake!” but the reason for why we are doing this is that for me and a couple of friends Runescape back in 2006 was the most amazing and fun filled time we’d ever had. I don’t expect this to get around 500-1000 players to be honest im doing this to try and relive the past memories that I had.

We will be using the released version of 2006Memorys but fixing many known bugs/glitches/dupes and adding much more complete content. The reason for why we are using such a complete base is because I do not want to spend alot of time on this project and mainly get on to playing it along with many other eager players.

Developers

x32/Ahridok - Ranno
Roone - Jamal

Update Log

[09-27-2013] - 2006memorys Downloaded [09-27-2013] - Repackaged the whole base and cleaned up ALOT of dead code [09-28-2013] - Patched up a small dupe

[/CENTER]

[center]Media

The networking has been edited and i tested it out by running 2000 bots they were spamming all in one spot and the server was not lagging alot but it was lagging may be because of my computer so to keep it from disconnecting actual players a cap of 1000 has been set as the players will be doing much more then just spamming.

The sage of lumbridge has been with us for such a long time no remake is complete without him!

4Ehrx.png760×499

Although this image isn’t of RR it still shows the pvp aspect of the 2006 era of runescape it was a ton of fun pking alongside your friends and your clan.

4Eix7.png756×499

Remember the good old trading days before the grand exchange and when players were actually communicating with one another well we’re trying to revive those memories.

[QUOTE]Runecrafting plays a very important role as it is the number one source of getting magic runes and fast!
[/QUOTE]

Random events are a good way to get some items and gain some expierience and they also help stop bots from gold farming

Are you brave enough to challenge the warriors of Al-Kharid if so take a trip down to the village of the desert!
